original_title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya
overview: Stand up comedian Pete Correale explores the absurdities of life, love and marriage in his hilarious comedy special where he gives his homegrown New Yorker take on everything from the joy of ice cream to the pain of political correctness.
tagline: Stand up comedian Pete Correale explores the absurdities of life, love and marriage.
title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya
